jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Gojek is looking for an experienced, data-driven Product Manager to lead developing a Unified Advanced Analytics Data Platform. As product lead, will support a group of PMs and cross-functional partners to drive the conceptual and technical development of product ideas from end-to-end for Gojek and our customer base. You love empowering your team to maximize their impact and love working with passionate customers, talented designers and engineers to craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.
jobsJson.description: Gojek is looking for an experienced, data-driven Product Manager to lead developing a Unified Advanced Analytics Data Platform. As product lead, will support a group of PMs and cross-functional partners to drive the conceptual and technical development of product ideas from end-to-end for Gojek and our customer base. You love empowering your team to maximize their impact and love working with passionate customers, talented designers and engineers to craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Lead to develop a road map that will become the foundation of our advanced analytics platform at Gojek. Be accountable and responsible for roadmap
  • Define OKRs for your unified data platform and hold your team accountable for setting and achieving their individual OKRs
  • Be outcome driven, everything we do needs metrics. Track these metrics and strive to improve those day in day out
  • Manage and support product managers in your product group, providing them with guidance and mentorship to maximize their potential
  • Recruit, hire and train new team members as you grow your product area
  • Be an effective leader. Partner and collaborate with your stakeholders. Core stakeholders are: Data science team, Machine Learning Infrastructure team or Data Science Platform team. Fraud Platform & tools team, Businesses intelligence & Analyst team, Product and Platform teams at Gojek
  • Continue to strive for Innovation. Be aware of innovation that is happening in the data platform and advanced analytics space. Help us understand the trade offs between build vs buy and guide us to make informed decisions
  • Build strategic partnerships with global companies that will give us a competitive edge
  • You must be execution and delivery driven. Delivering solutions on time, on budget matters and most importantly solving customer needs counts
  • We expect our product managers to be great at stakeholder management, prioritisation and project management

• BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 6-10 years of product experience including at least 1-2 years as a group lead managing other product managers; Experience as a software engineer / developer and working with distributed teams are high desired.
  • Successful track record in planning, developing and executing strategy for multiple projects while collaborating cross-functionally
  • Ability to easily transition from high level strategic thinking to creative and detailed execution.
  • Solid organization, leadership, team-building, and mentorship experience, fluent in English and are a confident communicator
  • You’re entrepreneurial and are comfortable working in a complex and face-paced environment
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
